statements: SELECT * FROM unusual_transactions;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM unusual_transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_description FROM unusual_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM unusual_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_description FROM unusual_transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM unusual_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM unusual_transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT transaction_description FROM unusual_transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT account_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM unusual_transactions WHERE transaction_description LIKE '%fraud%'
SELECT * FROM unusual_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2023-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2023-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 3 AND amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM anomalies ORDER BY detected_date ASC, anomaly_type;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT transaction_id, amount, user_id FROM transactions t JOIN anomalies a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id WHERE a.anomaly_type = 'fraud' AND a.detected_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS transaction_count, MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, a.anomaly_type FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN anomalies a ON t.transaction_id = a.transaction_id ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM unusual_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM flagged_transactions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM unusual_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM unusual_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM suspicious_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM flagged_transactions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM unusual_transactions) GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY COUNT(transaction_id) DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-12-31' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM flagged_transactions WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT transaction_id, reason, flagged FROM unusual_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_name ASC
SELECT transaction_id, amount, user_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND user_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, reason FROM unusual_transactions WHERE flagged = TRUE
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_time FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, location FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT city, state FROM locations WHERE zip_code = 90210;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_time, user_id, location FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, address, zip_code, city, state FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';
SELECT id, transaction_id, user_id, reason FROM unusual_transactions WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY transaction_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, alert_time, alert_type, message, resolved FROM alerts WHERE resolved = false ORDER BY alert_time ASC LIMIT 3;
